* Place Five


Place Five
==========

![CM North](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/revize_photo_gallery/Photos/CM%20North.jpeg?t=202508261244510)Debrah North  
  

A Dallas native and longtime DeSoto resident, Debrah brings a diverse background in financial services, insurance, asset management, and technology. Her professional career spans roles with Fortune 500 companies, tech startups, and consulting engagements across the U.S., with a focus on leadership development and client relationship management. Debrah has also worked extensively in insurance planning, specializing in retirement and contingency solutions. Across both corporate and public sectors, she has consistently demonstrated a commitment to community engagement, strategic growth, and operational excellence.

Debrah currently serves as a member of the Texas Municipal League President’s Legislative Ad Hoc Committee, which brings together local leaders from across Texas to help guide TML’s legislative priorities. She has also earned certification in the Texas Public Funds Investment Act (PFIA) 8-Hour Course, ensuring full compliance with Texas Government Code Chapter 2256.008.  
  
As an alumna of the DeSoto Civic Academy, DeSoto Citizens Police Academy Alumni Association, Leadership Southwest, and Leadership North Texas, Debrah has cultivated meaningful relationships and developed the skills to collaborate effectively with diverse community and regional stakeholders.

In addition to her professional and civic contributions, Debrah was a devoted caregiver for over 10 years—a role that reflects her compassion and sense of service.

Debrah remains deeply committed to thoughtful, local decision-making that fosters a vibrant and inclusive community.

**Contact Information**  
**Email**: [DNorth@desototexas.gov](mailto:DMarks@desototexas.gov)  
**Phone**: 945-372-8305
